front.title: DHCP option for STA Location Information

abstract.t: This document introduces WTP information transported using DHCPv4/v6. In this procedure, DHCPv4/v6 snooping is deployed on the WTP node or AC node. Then the WTP information can be inserted into the extension option of DHCPv4/v6 message. GW obtain the WTP information of the subscriber through which the subscriber accesses network.
